observation: AntiqueFabric.com | Antique fabrics, feedsacks, lace, buttons, trims and more.  Starting with over 5,000 yards of antique fabrics including feedsacks, dress rayons and crazy quilt fabrics as well as quilting cottons from the 1850's. Navigation Antique Fabrics 1800’s to 1970’s 1800’s Fabrics 1960’s and Later Cigarette Silks Crazy Quilt Fabrics Feedsack Scraps Other Fabrics Novelties Quilts & Quilt Blocks Scrap Bags Drapery & Decorator Lace & Trims Rayons Buttons Vintage Fabrics 1980’s to 2003 All Holidays & Celebrations All Christmas Santa Claus Sleigh Holly snowflake snowmen Wreath Christmas Tree Winter Thanksgiving Halloween Patterns Cheaters Check Floral Geometric Prints Animals Cowboys Fall Fruit Hearts Kitchen & Veggies Leaves Oriental Southwest Stars TieDye/Batik Tropicals Bundles Fat Quarters Paisley Plaid Stripe Quilt & Quilting Vintage Quilt Kits My Account Login Checkout About Us AntiqueFabric.com is located in Boise, ID. Starting with over 5,000 yards of antique fabrics including feedsacks, dress rayons and crazy quilt fabrics as well as quilting cottons from the 1850's through the early 2000's, new fabrics are added to the website on a regular basis. This venture started when The Kirk Collection decided to sell its antique fabric collection nearly 20 years ago. As a result of purchasing a large collection from an avid quilter, in addition to antique fabric, the collection included a large quantity of fabric from the 1980's to early 2000's. If you have special needs or a fabric emergency, feel free to call or send an email, and we will search the collection for the fabric you need, whether you are finishing a treasured family heirloom, putting together costumes for a film or stage production or dressing a special doll. The best way to contact us is via email at antiquefabric@gmail.com or 208-921-6603. Arnold Print Works Samples $ Add to cart 1840’s Chintz 1840's Chintz quantity Chintz w/Rose & Bamboo Cocheco – Lawrence & Co. Agent 1900's Turn of the Century Daisies Scheurer Fabric Sample Orange Flowers on Pink Scheurer Fabric Sample Blue & Gray Stylized Flowers Scheurer Fabric Sample Wm. Simpson Sons & Co.
